code: import React,{useEffect}from"react";import{useDispatch,useSelector}from"react-redux";import{fetchPopular}from"../redux/slices/moviesSlice";import MovieCard from"../components/MovieCard";import Pagination from"../components/Pagination";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";export default function Home(){const dispatch=useDispatch();const{items,page,total_pages,status,error}=useSelector(s=>s.movies.popular);useEffect(()=>{if(status==="idle")dispatch(fetchPopular(1));},[dispatch,status]);const onChange=p=>dispatch(fetchPopular(p));if(status==="loading")return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"center",children:"Loading popular\u2026"});if(status==="failed")return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"center error",children:error});return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("section",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Popular Movies"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"grid",children:items.map(m=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(MovieCard,{movie:m},m.id))}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Pagination,{page:page,totalPages:total_pages,onChange:onChange})]});}
